content.question: In the passage, the views expressed by which of the following most clearly support Margolis’ argument about the “boy wonder myth” (paragraph 3, sentence 2)?

choices.label: Drew Houston, founder of Dropbox (paragraph 1, sentence 8)
Lesley Chilcott, director of the video “What Most Schools Don’t Teach” (paragraph 1, sentence 16)
Gabe Newell, founder of Valve (paragraph 2, sentence 5)
Vanessa Hurst, founder of Girl Develop It (paragraph 4, sentence 3)

content.answer: Gabe Newell, founder of Valve (paragraph 2, sentence 5)

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain ways claims are qualified through modifiers, counterarguments, and alternative perspectives.
